diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+#include "THStorageClass.hpp"
+
+THStorage::THStorage(
+    at::ScalarType scalar_type,
+    ptrdiff_t size,
+    at::Allocator* allocator,
+    char flag)
+    : scalar_type(scalar_type),
+      data_ptr(at::DataPtr(
+          allocator->allocate(at::elementSize(scalar_type) * size))),
+      size(size),
+      refcount(1),
+      weakcount(1), // from the strong reference
+      flag(flag), // TH_STORAGE_REFCOUNTED | TH_STORAGE_RESIZABLE),
+      allocator(allocator),
+      finalizer(std::unique_ptr<THFinalizer>(nullptr)) {}
+
+THStorage::THStorage(at::ScalarType scalar_type, char flag)
+    : THStorage(scalar_type, 0, getTHDefaultAllocator(), flag) {}
body: (because we don't want `getTHDefaultAllocator` in the minimal object set.)
body_html: (because we don't want getTHDefaultAllocator in the minimal object set.)
body_text: (because we don't want getTHDefaultAllocator in the minimal object set.)
